title: Gold Rises on Haven Demand After US Captures Venezuelan Leader
description: Gold and silver rose, with investors seeking the safety of precious metals amid heightened geopolitical risk following the US capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
content: Gold and silver rose, with investors seeking the safety of precious metals amid heightened geopolitical risk following the US capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
